name: Outlaw 3310
description:
###########################################

#
#  Outlaw
#
#  An adaptation of the Atari 2600 game
#  "Outlaw" for the Chip8.
#
#  Move with ASWD and fire with E.
#  Holding a direction while firing will
#  fire an angled shot, which ricochets.
#
#  Adapted again for Nokia 3310 JAM 2
#
###########################################
